name: stream-lite
description: Minimalistic and modular functional reactive programming library with familiar interface and tiny footprint.

scripts.cover: cross-env BUNDLE_ENV=cjs nyc --check-coverage --lines 98 mocha src/index.test.js --compilers js:babel-register
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf es && rimraf umd && rimraf add && rimraf core && rimraf internal && rimraf operators && rimraf statics && rimraf util
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:es: cross-env BUNDLE_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --ignore src/index.test.js
scripts.build:umd: microbundle -i src/Stream.js -o umd/index.js --format umd --compress false --name Stream
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Peter Shev <piotrsevcenco@gmail.com> (http://petershev.com/)
